'''Evilsoother''' is [[Xingqiu]]'s [[Level 4 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The DMG increase of this constellation is not a [[DMG Bonus]]. Instead, it provides a [[Damage#Base DMG Multiplier|Base DMG Multiplier]] of '''1.5''' which is directly multiplicative with the Elemental Skill's Base DMG.
